statements: SELECT email, password FROM phishing_credentials;
SELECT password, email FROM phishing_credentials;
SELECT * FROM phishing_credentials;
SELECT email FROM phishing_credentials WHERE password='123456';
SELECT password FROM phishing_credentials ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT email, password FROM phishing_credentials WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT password, email FROM phishing_credentials WHERE password = '1234';
SELECT * FROM phishing_credentials WHERE password LIKE '%password%';
SELECT email FROM phishing_credentials WHERE email IN ('user1@gmail.com', 'user2@gmail.com');
SELECT * FROM phishing_credentials ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM victims_emails;
SELECT id, email FROM victims_emails ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM victims_emails WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, email FROM victims_emails WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT id, email, password FROM victims_emails ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM victims_emails WHERE id = 1;
SELECT email, password FROM victims_emails WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM phishing_attempts WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT victim_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attempts FROM phishing_attempts GROUP BY victim_id HAVING total_attempts > 5;
SELECT id, email, password FROM victims_emails WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6, 8);
SELECT * FROM victims;
SELECT email_address, password FROM victims ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT sender_email, recipient_email FROM phishing_emails WHERE email_id = 1;
SELECT email_id, email_subject, email_body FROM phishing_emails WHERE sender_email = 'attacker@example.com';
SELECT email_id, success FROM phishing_stats WHERE victim_id = 5 ORDER BY stat_id ASC;
SELECT email_address, password FROM victims WHERE id = 1;
SELECT email_id, sender_email, recipient_email FROM phishing_emails WHERE email_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM phishing_emails WHERE email_subject LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY email_id DESC;
SELECT email_id, sender_email, victim_id, success FROM phishing_stats WHERE success = true ORDER BY email_id ASC;
SELECT sender_email, COUNT(email_id) AS total_emails FROM phishing_stats GROUP BY sender_email HAVING total_emails > 1;
SELECT * FROM victims;
SELECT email_address FROM victims WHERE password='123456';
SELECT ip_address, timestamp FROM phishing_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT email_address, password FROM victims WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM success_log WHERE success_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM victims WHERE email_address LIKE 'john.doe%' AND password = 'password123';
SELECT ip_address, timestamp FROM phishing_attempts WHERE victim_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT hacker_id, location FROM hacker_logs WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT attempt_id, success_timestamp FROM success_log WHERE success_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM victims v JOIN phishing_attempts p ON v.email_address = 'alice@example.com' AND v.password = p.ip_address;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT password_id, password FROM passwords ORDER BY password_id DESC;
SELECT email FROM emails WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT user_id, email, password FROM users JOIN passwords ON users.user_id = passwords.password_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 3 ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM phishing_attempts WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT users.user_id, passwords.password FROM users JOIN passwords ON users.user_id = passwords.password_id;
